info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 2:27PM EDT until July 12 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Warren County in east central New York... Northwestern Saratoga County in east central New York... Northern Washington County in east central New York... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 226 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Huletts Landing to near Lake George Village to Northville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Whitehall, Lake George Village, Comstock, Day Center, Bolton Landing, Lake Luzerne Campground, Poultney Village, Mount Hope, Bolton, Hadley, Hampton, Lake George, Fort Ann, Cleverdale, North Granville, South Bay Village, Snody Dock, Conklingville, Truthville and Hampton Flats and the Great Sacandaga Lake. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
